pageContext.claim: “Just arrived in the United Kingdom. The only problem is that @CNN is the primary source of news available from the U.S. After watching it for a short while, I turned it off. All negative & so much Fake News, very bad for U.S. Big ratings drop. Why doesn’t owner @ATT do something?”
pageContext.analysis: CNN's ratings increased 7 percent year over year in the first quarter of 2019.
